languages.text: {n}Ксенос делает паузу, размышляя о чем-то. Затем он продолжает — в голосе отчетливо слышны нотки усталой скуки.{/n} "Знаешь, мон-кай... быть может, ты лжешь мне. Или же сам{mf||а} не знаешь, кто ведет твою руку. Так или иначе, но меня изрядно утомили твои попытки отсрочить неизбежное. Уверен, что и ты уже выдох{mf|ся|лась}, гоняясь за нами между звезд. Давай положим этому конец. Закончим противостояние. Мои силы против твоих. Раз и навсегда".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос делает паузу, размышляя о чем-то. Затем он продолжает — в голосе отчетливо слышны нотки усталой скуки.{/n} "Знаешь, мон-кай... быть может, ты лжешь мне. Или же сам{mf||а} не знаешь, кто ведет твою руку. Так или иначе, но меня изрядно утомили твои попытки отсрочить неизбежное. Уверен, что и ты уже выдох{mf|ся|лась}, гоняясь за нами между звезд. Давай положим этому конец. Закончим противостояние. Мои силы против твоих. Раз и навсегда".

languages.text: {n}The xenos pauses, mulling over something. Then he continues in an unmistakable tone of weary boredom,{/n} "I will tell you this, mon-keigh... I know you might be lying to me. Or you might even be unaware of who is guiding your hand. In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

Или же сам{mf||а} не знаешь, кто ведет твою руку. Так или иначе, но меня изрядно утомили твои попытки отсрочить неизбежное. Уверен, что и ты уже выдох{mf|ся|лась}, гоняясь за нами между звезд. Давай положим этому конец. Закончим противостояние. Мои силы против твоих. Раз и навсегда".

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos pauses, mulling over something. Then he continues in a distinct tone of weary boredom.{/n} "I will tell you this, mon-keigh... I know you might be lying to me. Or you might even be unaware of who is guiding your hand. One way or another, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us amidst the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

{n}The xenos pauses, mulling over something. Then he continues in an unmistakable tone of weary boredom,{/n} "I will tell you this, mon-keigh... I know you might be lying to me. Or you might even be unaware of who is guiding your hand. In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

languages.text: {n}El xenos se detiene, pensativo. Después, con un inconfundible tono de aburrimiento, continúa:{/n} «Te diré una cosa, mon-keigh... Sé que es posible que me estés mintiendo. O tal vez no sepas quién guía tus pasos. Sea como fuere, me he cansado de tus intentos de postergar lo inevitable. Imagino que tú también preferirías dejar de perseguirnos entre las estrellas. Acabemos con esto. Tus fuerzas contra las mías: pongamos fin a este enfrentamiento de una vez por todas».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses, mulling over something. Then he continues in an unmistakable tone of weary boredom,{/n} "I will tell you this, mon-keigh... I know you might be lying to me. Or you might even be unaware of who is guiding your hand. In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos se detiene, pensativo. Después, con un inconfundible tono de aburrimiento, continúa:{/n} «Te diré una cosa, mon-keigh... Sé que es posible que me estés mintiendo. O tal vez no sepas quién guía tus pasos. Sea como fuere, me he cansado de tus intentos de postergar lo inevitable. Imagino que tú también preferirías dejar de perseguirnos entre las estrellas. Acabemos con esto. Tus fuerzas contra las mías: pongamos fin a este enfrentamiento de una vez por todas».

languages.text: {n}异形顿了顿，思考了一会儿，之后以明确无误感到无聊的语气继续开了口。{/n}“猴子，我想告诉你的是……我知道你可能在对我说谎，也可能连你自己都不知道是谁在引导着你。总之，你仅仅是在拖延必将到来的事情，我已经感到厌倦了。当然，你在群星之间追逐我们，想必你们也已经筋疲力尽了。是时候结束这场对峙了，我的部队和你的部队正面开战，彻底解决这个问题吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses, mulling over something. Then he continues in an unmistakable tone of weary boredom,{/n} "I will tell you this, mon-keigh... I know you might be lying to me. Or you might even be unaware of who is guiding your hand. In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

traits.locale_text: {n}异形顿了顿，思考了一会儿，之后以明确无误感到无聊的语气继续开了口。{/n}“猴子，我想告诉你的是……我知道你可能在对我说谎，也可能连你自己都不知道是谁在引导着你。总之，你仅仅是在拖延必将到来的事情，我已经感到厌倦了。当然，你在群星之间追逐我们，想必你们也已经筋疲力尽了。是时候结束这场对峙了，我的部队和你的部队正面开战，彻底解决这个问题吧。”

languages.text: {n}異種族は何かを考え込むように止まった。そして、明らかにつまらなそうな口調でこう続けた。{/n}「これだけは言っておこう、モン＝ケイよ…お前は俺に嘘をついているかもしれない。あるいは、誰がお前の手を導いているのかさえもお前は知らないかもしれない。いずれにせよ、避けられぬ運命を遅らせる度々の試みにはほとほと呆れた。お前も惑星間で我々を追うのに疲れ切っていることだろう。もういいだろ。この膠着状態を終わらせよう。俺の軍とお前の軍で、決着をつけるんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses, mulling over something. Then he continues in an unmistakable tone of weary boredom,{/n} "I will tell you this, mon-keigh... I know you might be lying to me. Or you might even be unaware of who is guiding your hand. In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は何かを考え込むように止まった。そして、明らかにつまらなそうな口調でこう続けた。{/n}「これだけは言っておこう、モン＝ケイよ…お前は俺に嘘をついているかもしれない。あるいは、誰がお前の手を導いているのかさえもお前は知らないかもしれない。いずれにせよ、避けられぬ運命を遅らせる度々の試みにはほとほと呆れた。お前も惑星間で我々を追うのに疲れ切っていることだろう。もういいではないか。この膠着状態を終わらせよう。俺の軍とお前の軍で、決着をつけるのだ」

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos macht eine Pause und denkt über etwas nach. Dann fährt er im unmissverständlichen Ton ermüdeter Langeweile fort:{/n} "Ich sage Euch etwas, Chem-Pan-Sey ... Ich weiß, dass Ihr mich möglicherweise anlügt. Oder Ihr wisst vielleicht gar nicht, wer Eure Hand lenkt. Jedenfalls bin ich Eure Versuche leid, das Unvermeidliche hinauszuzögern. Sicher seid Ihr auch erschöpft von der ständigen Jagd auf uns in den Sternen. Lasst uns das Ganze beenden. Tragen wir diesen Konflikt aus. Meine Kräfte gegen Eure. Ein für alle Mal."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses, mulling over something. Then he continues in an unmistakable tone of weary boredom,{/n} "I will tell you this, mon-keigh... I know you might be lying to me. Or you might even be unaware of who is guiding your hand. In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos macht eine Pause und denkt über etwas nach. Dann fährt er im unmissverständlichen Ton ermüdeter Langeweile fort:{/n} "Ich sage Euch etwas, Chem-Pan-Sey ... Ich weiß, dass Ihr mich möglicherweise anlügt. Oder Ihr wisst vielleicht gar nicht, wer Eure Hand lenkt. Jedenfalls bin ich Eure Versuche leid, das Unvermeidliche hinauszuzögern. Sicher seid Ihr auch erschöpft von der ständigen Jagd auf uns in den Sternen. Lasst uns das Ganze beenden. Tragen wir diesen Konflikt aus. Meine Kräfte gegen Eure. Ein für alle Mal."

languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses, mulling over something. Then he continues in an unmistakable tone of weary boredom,{/n} "I will tell you this, mon-keigh... I know you might be lying to me. Or you might even be unaware of who is guiding your hand. In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

languages.text: {n}Le xénos s'interrompt un instant pour réfléchir, puis il reprend sur un ton qui exprime clairement sa lassitude :{/n} « Laissez-moi vous dire une chose, mon-keigh... Je sais qu'il est possible que vous me mentiez, ou peut-être ignorez-vous qui tire vos ficelles. Quoi qu'il en soit, je suis las de vous voir vous évertuer à retarder l'inévitable et je suis certain que vous en avez vous-même assez de nous chasser à travers le cosmos. Alors, finissons-en. Sortons de cette impasse. Mes forces contre les vôtres, une bonne fois pour toutes. »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses, mulling over something. Then he continues in an unmistakable tone of weary boredom,{/n} "I will tell you this, mon-keigh... I know you might be lying to me. Or you might even be unaware of who is guiding your hand. In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

Je sais qu'il est possible que vous me mentiez, ou peut-être ignorez-vous qui tire vos ficelles. Quoi qu'il en soit, je suis las de vous voir vous évertuer à retarder l'inévitable et je suis certain que vous en avez vous-même assez de nous chasser à travers le cosmos. Alors, finissons-en. Sortons de cette impasse. Mes forces contre les vôtres, une bonne fois pour toutes. »

languages.text: {n}Zeno duraksıyor ve derince düşünüyor. Sonrasında sıkıldığını belli eden bir tonla konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Sana şunu beyan edeyim mon-keigh... Bana yalan söylüyor olabileceğini görüyorum. Hatta yol göstericinin kim olduğunun farkında bile olmayabilirsin. Her hâlükârda kaçınılmazı erteleme çabalarından gına geldi. Şüphesiz sen de bu yıldızlar arası kovalamacadan yorulmuşsundur. Artık bu vaziyete, bu anlaşmazlığı bir son verelim. Benim kuvvetlerime karşı seninkiler. Tek kalemde bitirelim."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses, mulling over something. Then he continues in an unmistakable tone of weary boredom,{/n} "I will tell you this, mon-keigh... I know you might be lying to me. Or you might even be unaware of who is guiding your hand. In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

Bana yalan söylüyor olabileceğini görüyorum. Hatta yol göstericinin kim olduğunun farkında bile olmayabilirsin. Her hâlükârda kaçınılmazı erteleme çabalarından gına geldi.
